translation.en: [Anne] I almost got married once.
Wentworth held my heart.
But he was a sailor without rank or fortune.
translation.ko: 그러나 그는 지위도 재산도 없는 선원이었고

translation.en: And I was persuaded to give him up.
[Anne] Now I'm single and thriving.
I spend my time drinking fine wines,
enjoying warm baths…
and lying face down on my bed.
Like I said, thriving.
Who needs romance
when one has… family?
My father.
He's never met a reflective surface he didn't like.
Vanity is the beginning and end of his character.
translation.ko: 아버지를 세 단어로 표현한다면 허영, 허영…

translation.en: Also the middle.
"Sir Walter Elliot,
born March 1st, 1760."
"Man of consequence,
known for his exquisite jawline."
[Anne] He is the sole object of his own warmest respect and devotion.
translation.ko: 오직 자신만을 향한 뜨거운 존경과 헌신을 보여주는 분이세요

translation.en: [sighs] One's family is only escapable by two things,
marriage and death.
Both seem unlikely in the immediate future.
translation.ko: 둘 다 저와는 거리가 멀어 보이네요

translation.en: "Married July 15th, 1784, to Jane."
My mother.
-I miss her. -[Sir Walter] "Jane died in 1801."
"By her, Sir Walter issued three children."
My sisters.
[Sir Walter] "Elizabeth, celebrated beauty
and Somerset's most fashion-forward luminary."
Elizabeth, the eldest.
[Sir Walter] "Mary, married to Charles Musgrove,
heir to the superior Uppercross estate."
Mary, the youngest.
"And Anne, born August 9th, 1787."
And me, middle child,
the crack in his looking glass.
Shame there wasn't anything nice we could think to add about you, Anne.
translation.ko: 생일 말고 적을 게 없어서 안타깝구나, 앤

translation.en: Thanks for trying.
You're welcome. I wanted to leave you out entirely,
translation.ko: - 신경 써줘서 고마워 - 고맙긴 난 빼고 싶었는데 아빠가 고인 같을까 봐 안 된대

translation.en: but Daddy thought people might think you had died.
translation.ko: 난 빼고 싶었는데 아빠가 고인 같을까 봐 안 된대

translation.en: -Debt collectors. -[Elizabeth] Daddy. Daddy!
[Anne] The one thing my father loves more than himself is spending money.
translation.ko: 아빠가 자신보다 좋아하는 게 돈 쓰는 일이었으니

translation.en: It was always going to run out one day.
-Daddy… -Daddy's broke, princess.
Playtime's over.
[lawyer] There, there, Sir Walter.
Lots of people face debt at some point in their lives.
translation.ko: 누구나 살면서 빚더미에 앉을 때가 있어요

translation.en: You must retrench.
You have no choice.
I've drawn up a vigorous plan of economy. The most necessary reductions are underlined.
translation.ko: 제가 적은 예산을 보시고 밑줄 그은 부분을 아끼세요

translation.en: Meet my mother's best friend and unflinching speaker of truth.
translation.ko: 서슴없는 잔소리의 주인공은 엄마의 막역한 친구분이세요

translation.en: Lady Russell took it on herself to give me advice on every topic as she felt my mother would have.
translation.ko: 레이디 러셀은 엄마 대신 제게 많은 걸 가르쳐주셨죠

translation.en: Always insightful and helpful.
With one… notable exception.
translation.ko: 딱 한 번 헛다리를 짚은 적이 있긴 하지만요

translation.en: Some people don't have homes or food. Try to put this into perspective.
translation.ko: 세상엔 집도 없이 끼니를 굶는 이들도 있잖습니까 그들의 입장이 되어보세요

translation.en: Mr. Shepherd,
if I was interested in gaining perspective by thinking of the poor,
translation.ko: 내가 진정 가난한 자의 입장에서 생각했다면

translation.en: I'd ask you the rate charged by your barber.
translation.ko: 당신 수임료도 이발비 수준으로 깎자고 했겠죠

translation.en: Don't ask me to change things by seeing them differently.
See things my way, then change them until they are different.
translation.ko: 당신이 내 입장이 되어서 이끌어 달란 말이에요

translation.en: Perhaps we need only stop giving to charities.
Do we do that?
Jane would be ashamed.
She begged me to protect her daughters from their father's excessive excesses
translation.ko: 당신의 터무니없는 낭비로부터 딸들을 지켜달라고 했는데

translation.en: and I have failed.
Your arrogance will bankrupt them all.
translation.ko: 그 오만 때문에 딸들이 나앉게 생겼다고요

translation.en: Father,
true reputation comes
from honesty, integrity, compassion,
translation.ko: 사람의 평판을 결정하는 건 정직과 인품, 연민

translation.en: acceptance of responsibility for the welfare of others.
Anne, we're speaking of something substantial.
translation.ko: 앤, 지금이 뜬구름 잡는 얘기나 할 때냐?

translation.en: Try to keep up.
Why not downsize and move somewhere cheaper?
translation.ko: 작은 집으로 이사해서 돈을 아끼는 건 어떨까요?

translation.en: Bath is lovely.
And the spas there will work wonders for your skin.
And what of Kellynch Hall?
Just the other day I met a wealthy naval officer
who would pay a handsome rent for a house like Kellynch.
I will not have a Navy man in my house.
translation.ko: 내 집에 해군 따위를 들일 순 없지

translation.en: -They're all ugly. -Admiral Croft is quite handsome.
Admiral? What right has the British Navy
to bring persons of obscure birth into undue distinction?
translation.ko: 출생에 근본도 없는 자에게 칭호를 내린단 말입니까?

translation.en: Only God has the right to bestow rank.
What good is a title if you have to earn it?
What good is anything if you have to earn it?
Admiral Croft is a fine gentleman.
His wife told me about a brother who lived among us a few years back.
translation.ko: 사모님의 동생분께서 몇 년 전에 이 지역에 거주하셨다던데요

translation.en: He was also a naval officer.
What was his name? Uh, Wellington?
Weathers? Winslow?
You mean Wentworth?
-[Mr. Shepherd] Wentworth? Yes. -Anne, darling.
In truth, I can hardly remember who you are speaking of.
translation.ko: 사실 어떤 사람이었는지 기억도 안 나요

translation.en: [Sir Walter] You really think my skin will do well in Bath?
[Lady Russell] Oh, yes.
-[Lady Russell] Yes. -[knock on door]
Sweetheart… it's been seven years.
Eight.
You couldn't possibly still feel--
I do.
Frederick Wentworth was the only person,
save you and my mother,
who ever really saw me.
And understood me.
And loved me.
And the only one I wanted to-- Exchange calling cards with?
translation.ko: - 그 사람 말곤 아무와도… - 명함 주고받기 싫다?

translation.en: Well put.
You lied when you told me time would heal me of my pain.
translation.ko: 시간이 해결해 줄 거라더니 제게 거짓말하셨네요

translation.en: -You're angry with me. -I'm angry with myself.
For… being persuaded.
For not seeing then what I see so clearly now.
translation.ko: 이토록 당연한 사실을 그땐 미처 몰랐으니까

translation.en: That I would have been a far happier woman in keeping him
translation.ko: 그 사람과 함께했다면 지금보다 훨씬 더 행복했을 거란 사실을요

translation.en: than I have been in giving him up.
translation.ko: 지금보다 훨씬 더 행복했을 거란 사실을요

translation.en: I'm sorry. The truth is, marriage is transactional for women.
Our basic security is on the line.
I could not let you throw yourself away on a man with no rank, no fortune,
translation.ko: 지위도, 재산도 없는 남자에게 널 내던질 순 없잖니?

translation.en: nothing but himself to recommend him.
That was the part I liked.
Besides, all of his confidence was justified. He is rich now.
translation.ko: 근거 없는 자신감도 아니었어요 이젠 돈도 많고

translation.en: And a captain.
Then, why haven't you heard from him?
Because…
I broke his heart.
And he knew why.
I thought I was protecting you. I was wrong.
I see that now.
And I'm sorry.
You will find the one that's meant for you.
translation.ko: 너에게 맞는 짝을 찾게 될 거야

translation.en: The one who loves you enough to fight for you.
translation.ko: 널 위해 싸워줄 만큼 너를 사랑하는 사람을

translation.en: Darling, I admire how strongly you feel about it,
but at some point, you have to move on.
I fear Wentworth is a ship that has sailed,
translation.ko: 그는 돌릴 수 없는 배라고 감히 말해주고 싶구나

translation.en: so I say this with love.
Abandon all hope.
It's true, he hasn't written to me.
But… I knew he wouldn't.
He respects himself too much to beg.
translation.ko: 자존심이 너무 세서 매달릴 리가 없거든요

translation.en: He didn't fight for me because
he could never value a love that wasn't offered freely.
translation.ko: 조건을 따지는 사랑은 소중히 여길 수 없어서예요

translation.en: I'm sure he's put it all behind him.
I, on the other hand,
have kept it painfully in front of me.
The first note he passed me in church.
The playlist he made me.
One lock of hair from him.
And one from his horse, Sampson, whom I scarcely knew.
translation.ko: 저와는 딱히 친하지도 않았던 말 샘프슨의 말총이에요

translation.en: And this cow bell,
whose sad, empty knell best captures my melancholy.
translation.ko: 내 우울함을 잘 나타내는 애잔하고 허전한 소리를 내죠

translation.en: Eight years of it.
He's been all over.
And the Navy adores him.
"Frederick Wentworth turns a pretty penny aboard the Laconia."
"Frederick Wentworth rescues a beached whale
as onlookers weep."
And yet… no marriage announcement.
Nothing at all to indicate
he's since been in any way attached to another.
translation.ko: 누구랑 만났다는 얘기는 그 어디에도 없어요

translation.en: In other words…
hope springs eternal.
[Elizabeth] As we're moving, I need to think about my Bath persona.
translation.ko: 이사가 결정됐으니 어떤 사람이 될지 정해야 돼요

translation.en: I think Bath Elizabeth should be less sophisticated than London Elizabeth,
translation.ko: 바스 엘리자베스는 런던 엘리자베스만큼 세련되진 않았지만

translation.en: but not as free-spirited as country Elizabeth.
Penelope, what do you think?
You'll accompany the Elliots north, Mrs. Clay?
Oh, I wouldn't dream of imposing.
Of course you would. You dream of nothing but.
And lucky for you, I wouldn't dream of going anywhere without you.
translation.ko: 안심해요, 난 퍼넬러피 없인 아무 데도 안 가니까

translation.en: Mrs. Penelope Clay,
widowed, though she never speaks of it.
translation.ko: 남편과 사별했는데 그 얘긴 하지 않아요

translation.en: He was a corpse when they met, so perhaps the transition escaped her attention.
translation.ko: 늙은 남편이라 결혼할 때부터 시체라고 생각했던 걸까요?

translation.en: Lady Russell worries that Mrs. Clay has designs on my father,
translation.ko: 레이디 러셀은 클레이 부인이 아버지와의 재혼을 노린다지만

translation.en: but I don't think she's his type.
Besides, can you actually imagine my father marrying down?
translation.ko: 아버지가 낮은 계급의 상대와 재혼하실 리도 없죠

translation.en: Oh, you must come, if your father can spare you.
Mr. Shepherd, do you think you can spare Penelope?
translation.ko: 셰퍼드 씨, 퍼넬러피가 우리와 동행해도 될까요?

translation.en: Good, fine, exquisite, Sir Walter. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 월터 경은 참 선하시고 훌륭하시고, 섬세하세요

translation.en: You really are too generous for your own good! [laughs]
translation.ko: 너무 자상하셔서 여자들이 가만 안 두겠어요

translation.en: [Sir Walter] We'll need your pleasant company
to make amends for the many plain faces we shall have to endure in Bath.
translation.ko: 못생긴 바스 사람들 틈에서 내 두 눈이 무사할 겁니다

translation.en: Now, Sir Walter, not everyone was made to be handsome.
translation.ko: 세상 모두가 아름다울 수는 없는 법이죠

translation.en: Your beauty will shine twice as brightly amongst them.
translation.ko: 월터 경의 외모는 그곳에서 두 배로 빛날 거예요

translation.en: It is said if you're a five in London, you're a ten in Bath.
Well, just think,
you and Elizabeth, you'll be thirteens there.
You'll be at least a six, Anne.
[Elizabeth] Anyway, Anne won't be joining us for quite some time.
translation.ko: 참, 앤은 나중에 우리랑 합류할 거예요

translation.en: What?
I got a letter from Mary today.
She's ill again and needs you at Uppercross immediately.
translation.ko: 또 병이 들어서 너를 어퍼크로스로 보내달래

translation.en: I know you barely tolerate her.
Still, it's a more positive reaction than anyone else has towards her,
translation.ko: 그나마 아버지나 나보다는 덜 싫어하는 편이니 "또 아파, 이번엔 심각해 도와줘, 메리"

translation.en: making you the logical choice.
Fabulous.
[Elizabeth] Make sure the nice linens are hidden before the admiral arrives.
translation.ko: 제독이 오기 전에 고급 침대보는 숨겨놓도록 해

translation.en: Why? Do you think they'll steal them?
I don't like the idea of their naked skin on my sheets.
translation.ko: 내 침대보에 남이 맨살 비비는 건 싫어!

translation.en: It might bring you luck.
And hide the ledgers. I don't want anyone assuming my identity.
translation.ko: 장부도 치워놔라 날 사칭할 수도 있어

translation.en: I don't think anyone wants your credit at this point, Father.
translation.ko: 아버지 신용 상태를 보면 굳이 그럴까 싶네요

translation.en: Oh, and remind them, in a gentle way,
never to go anywhere near my rose garden.
translation.ko: 내 장미 정원 근처에도 가지 말라고

translation.en: Oh, yes, please. And the shrubberies.
I don't like the idea of my shrubberies being enjoyed by others.
translation.ko: 남이 내 관목으로 눈 호강하는 건 싫거든

translation.en: Use the scratchy linen,
don't set foot in the garden and don't look at the shrubberies.
Any other hospitable words?
That is all. Oh, but please make sure every room is spotless before they arrive.
translation.ko: 그거면 돼 그리고 그 사람들 오기 전에 방 청소 확실히 해둬라

translation.en: I don't want rumors circulating about dust.
translation.ko: 집에서 먼지 나온다고 소문나는 건 싫다

translation.en: It's even more incredible than we were told.
translation.ko: 듣던 것보다 한층 더 근사한 저택이로군요

translation.en: You mustn't worry, we'll be excellent tenants.
translation.ko: 깨끗하게 생활할 테니 걱정하실 것 없습니다

translation.en: Do you always travel with your husband?
Oh, yes. And no one will ever stop me.
I've crossed the Atlantic four times,
gone once to the East Indies and back again.
Cork, Lisbon, Gibraltar…
The happiest moments of my life have been spent aboard a ship.
translation.ko: 인생 최고의 순간들을 배 위에서 맞았답니다

translation.en: You're very lucky.
[Mrs. Croft] You'll see when you're in love.
translation.ko: 앤도 사랑에 빠지면 알게 될 거예요

translation.en: You know, Anne, Mrs. Croft's baby brother is a bachelor.
He's a captain in the Navy, quite successful.
translation.ko: 해군 대령으로 있는데 꽤 잘나가는 친구죠

translation.en: Edward, please don't.
A woman without a husband is not a problem to be solved.
translation.ko: 여자가 결혼 안 한 게 문제도 아닌데 저러네요

translation.en: -I knew your brother, actually. -[Mrs. Croft] Did you?
-Oh, how wonderful. -[Anne chuckles]
Perhaps we can all have dinner together once he joins us.
Joins you?
-[Mrs. Croft] His ship just docked. -[Admiral] He'll be here in two days.
translation.ko: - 막 하선했거든요 - 이틀 후면 올 겁니다

translation.en: These gardens are so beautiful.
I wonder how he feels as to a meeting.
translation.ko: 나를 만나는 걸 어떻게 생각할지 궁금해요

translation.en: If he'd wished to see me before now, he need not have waited.
translation.ko: 내가 보고 싶었으면 진작 보러 왔겠죠

translation.en: He's angry still, I'm sure.
What if I've been wrong?
What if he's been pining for me day and night all these years?
[coachman] Whoa there!
Here you are.
[Mary] Can someone help me?
Mary is preferable to Elizabeth
in that she's a total narcissist.
So, conversing with her requires very little energy
and can be great fun.
Once, I went an entire 24 hours
speaking exclusively in Italian.
She only noticed when I asked her to pass the sale.
She's so wrapped up in her own suffering
that, until I clear my throat, she won't even notice I'm here.
translation.ko: 헛기침하기 전까진 내가 온 줄도 모를 거예요

translation.en: Watch.
First, she'll complain about some unidentifiable ailment that has her on the verge of death.
translation.ko: 첫째로 정체 모를 병 때문에 죽게 생겼다고 한탄한 다음

translation.en: Next, she'll rail against her husband for not caring for her properly.
translation.ko: 둘째, 자기를 방치했다면서 남편을 욕할 거예요

translation.en: And then she will assault her in-laws,
who constantly disrespect her and must secretly despise her.
translation.ko: 속으로 자기를 혐오하고 무례하게 군다는 이유로요

translation.en: I'm monstrously relieved you're here.
I don't know what it is. A bug of some sort.
I can't move. I'm on the verge of death.
translation.ko: 움직일 수가 없어 나 죽게 생겼어

translation.en: Charles is out shooting, not a single caring word on his way out.
translation.ko: 찰스는 말 한마디 없이 사냥하러 나가더라

translation.en: And my in-laws sent me that lovely bouquet.
translation.ko: 시가 사람들이 저 예쁜 꽃다발을 보냈어

translation.en: Isn't that sweet?
They'll rot, and I'll feel worse than if they hadn't sent anything at all.
translation.ko: 하지만 결국 시들 테고 아무것도 안 받았을 때보다 더 우울해지겠지

translation.en: How unkind is it to remind a dying person of decay?
translation.ko: 너무 무신경하잖아 죽어가는 사람한테 죽는 걸 보내는 게 어딨어?

translation.en: Anne, these people hate me.
The children are monsters, the house is drafty
translation.ko: 거기다 애들은 사고뭉치에 집은 웃풍이 들고

translation.en: and nobody cares about the theater anymore.
Precisely, Anne, yes.
-Anne! -Anne!
Meet my sisters in-law,
Henrietta and Louisa Musgrove.
They are beautiful in every way.
-Anne! -[Anne] Girls!
We were so glad when Mary said that you'd come.
translation.ko: 온다는 얘기 듣고 얼마나 기다렸는지 몰라요!

translation.en: We've been positively giddy all week.
You must promise to spend every waking second with us, no excuses.
translation.ko: 이제 우리랑 떨어지지 마요 빠지기 없어요

translation.en: When you aren't attending to your sister of course.
-How are you feeling, Mary? -You haven't asked me how I'm feeling.
translation.ko: - 몸은 좀 어때? - 내 걱정은 안 해?

translation.en: -I just did. -[Mary] I'm close to death.
I can feel my organs decomposing.
-[giggling] -Same as yesterday, then.
Encouraging that, though her organs rot, her personality remains as fresh as ever.
translation.ko: 비록 장기는 썩을지라도 성깔은 그대로라는 뜻이겠죠?

translation.en: Anne, you must dine with us every night, delight us with your playing,
translation.ko: 매일 본채에서 저녁 먹고 피아노 연주도 들려줘요

translation.en: because we will do nothing but dance and sing and laugh.
translation.ko: 다 같이 춤추고 노래하고 깔깔댈 거니까!

translation.en: [kids] Marie Antoinette!
[Anne] How dare you speak my name, you naughty subjects!
translation.ko: 감히 내 이름을 입에 올리다니 무례하도다!

translation.en: Careful, boys, ladies don't like to be trampled.
And your mother has a headache.
To have things near your face when you don't know where they've been!
translation.ko: 어디서 뒹굴었을지도 모르는데 왜 안아주는 거야?

translation.en: We're hungry, Marie Antoinette.
-Well, let them eat cake! -[Charles] No cake until after supper.
translation.ko: - 케이크나 먹으라지! - 식사 전에 케이크 금지야

translation.en: There'll be special guests tonight. We'll meet Admiral Croft and his wife.
translation.ko: 오늘 특별한 손님이 있어 크로프트 제독 부부야

translation.en: She's bringing her brother, Frederick Wentworth.
Just arrived this morning, we hear. A gallant captain!
I heard he once redirected an entire flotilla to save a beached whale.
translation.ko: 함대를 지휘해서 고래를 살린 적도 있다던데?

translation.en: [Mary] I had no idea you were fond of whales.
-Have you ever met Captain Wentworth? -In passing, long ago.
translation.ko: - 대령님을 만난 적 있어요? - 오래전에 잠깐

translation.en: -Is it true he's devastatingly handsome? -He has a kind face, yes.
translation.ko: - 정말 끔찍이 잘생겼어요? - 선한 인상을 지녔지

translation.en: And is it true he actually listens when women speak?
translation.ko: 여자 말에 귀 기울인다는 것도 진짜예요?

translation.en: He listens.
He listens with his whole body.
It's… electrifying.
Well, then, he sounds like just the man for you.
-I insist you pursue him. -Louisa…
No, no. I've made up my mind, Anne.
No more hiding your light underneath a bushel.
translation.ko: 더는 앤의 빛나는 등불을 바구니 아래 숨겨두지 마요

translation.en: You are very sweet, but I'm not interested
translation.ko: 그렇게 말해줘서 고맙지만 내 등불을 어디에 둘지는 내가 정할게

translation.en: in receiving instruction on where to put my light.
translation.ko: 내 등불을 어디에 둘지는 내가 정할게

translation.en: Or my bushel.
Tell me, honestly, why aren't you married?
translation.ko: 솔직히 말해줘요 왜 결혼 안 하는 거예요?

translation.en: I'm waiting to fall in love.
All right, here's what you'll do. At dinner, you'll sit right next to him.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 그럼 이렇게 해요 저녁 식사 때 그분 옆에 앉는 거예요

translation.en: I'll sit right next to him.
Then, you'll pretend not to know a thing about anything.
Men like explaining things.
Tell him you've never used utensils, ask him to teach you how to hold them.
translation.ko: 식기를 처음 써보니까 가르쳐달라고 하는 거예요

translation.en: Is this how they're teaching courtship these days?
Then, just when he starts to seem interested,
translation.ko: 그러고 나서 남자가 관심을 보이는 순간

translation.en: don't respond to a single thing he says.
As though you're a ghost.
He'll be hooked. [giggles]
So, then, just be myself.
Oh no. Don't do that until at least the second year of marriage.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 결혼 2년 차까진 앤처럼 굴면 안 돼요

translation.en: That may not be the worst advice.
-Mary! -Charles. What happened?
Mary, help. He's hurt his arm.
-[Mary] What has he done? -He fell from a tree.
Of course this happens the one evening people of interest are set to visit.
translation.ko: 하필 손님 오시는 날에 이런 일이 생기다니

translation.en: He didn't fall on purpose, Mary.
Someone will have to stay with him.
I'll bring you back some plum pudding.
translation.ko: 올 때 자두 푸딩 챙겨 올게

translation.en: So, it's the mother who must stay, then.
It's not enough I brought these humans into the world,
I must now miss dinners on account of them.
This is just my luck.
If there is anything disagreeable, men are sure to get out of it.
translation.ko: 힘든 일 생기면 남자만 쏙 빠져나가지

translation.en: Mary, my sweet, he's hurt.
And you aren't feeling quite yourself either.
translation.ko: 몸도 안 좋다면서 집에 있지 그래?

translation.en: Oh no, that's cleared up entirely.
I'm sure the Crofts will come again.
Oh, I hate my life.
If it's really bothering you, I'm happy to stay with you.
That goes without saying. Of course. I'm not gonna stay alone.
Wouldn't it be hard to be away from little Charles when he's in so much pain?
translation.ko: 아픈 아이랑 떨어져 있으면 더 괴롭지 않을까?

translation.en: No, Louisa.
Please understand.
The thing about me is, I am an empath.
translation.ko: 사실 난 타인의 고통에 극도로 민감해

translation.en: I'm actually the least equipped to be with my children when they're suffering
translation.ko: 아이들이 아플 때일수록 같이 있어선 안 되지

translation.en: because I feel it so deeply.
It's much better for me to be away.
Life is so much easier for people like Anne who aren't so sensitive.
translation.ko: 언니처럼 둔감하면 세상 살기 편할 텐데

translation.en: Mary, would you like me to stay alone while you go to dinner?
translation.ko: 메리, 내가 남을 테니까 식사에 다녀올래?

translation.en: That's so kind. I'll bring you back some plum pudding.
translation.ko: 역시 언니는 착해 자두 푸딩 챙겨 올게

translation.en: And perhaps a crust of bread and some gruel?
Don't worry, Anne, I'll talk you up.
I'll paint such a pretty picture, he'll be ready to propose by morning. Promise.
translation.ko: 홀딱 넘어가서 내일 청혼할지도 몰라요 나만 믿어요

translation.en: If only I could talk to him.
Frederick!
Oh. Ouch.
Perfect.
Thanks again for last night, Anne.
I really think you would have liked Captain Wentworth.
translation.ko: 앤도 웬트워스 대령이 맘에 들었을 거예요

translation.en: Um, this jam is too soggy.
I'd rather not have jam at all if it is to be soggy.
I want to be a captain.
Absolutely not.
No nephew of mine will be a sailor.
translation.ko: 내 조카가 선원 되는 꼴은 못 봐

translation.en: Don't you know they have to wear silly hats?
translation.ko: 우스꽝스러운 모자도 써야 한다는 거 모르니?

translation.en: Anne, please, I can't endure the sound of laughter before noon.
translation.ko: 제발 그만, 오전에는 웃음소리 못 들어주겠어

translation.en: And the rules are
you must grow a silly mustache.
-Mm. -[Mary] No.
[Charles] Wentworth doesn't have a mustache, but he is quite impressive.
Handsome, intelligent, rich.
-[child] Do it again! -[Anne] Oh, look at me.
I'm Captain Wentworth and I am very impressive!
translation.ko: 내 이름은 웬트워스 대령 끝내주는 남자다

translation.en: I'm rich and I'm handsome and everybody loves me!
translation.ko: 난 부자고, 잘생겼고 모두가 나를 좋아하지

translation.en: And I'm a sailor!
[Charles] Uh, Captain, meet Mary's sister, Anne.
-Actually, we… We've met. -We've met.
-Oh -Long ago, before I was rich.
But not before I was handsome.
You look… old.
-I didn't mean that. -What did you mean?
translation.ko: 그런 뜻이 아니에요 - 무슨 뜻이죠? - 예전보다 늙었다는 뜻이죠

translation.en: Old… Older… than you used to look.
-Your face has matured. -Small price to pay for a life of purpose.
translation.ko: 얼굴이 성숙해졌어요 목적 있는 삶을 살아서 그런가 봐요

translation.en: -Are you implying my life lacks purpose? -How would I know?
translation.ko: - 난 목적이 없다는 뜻? - 나야 모르죠

translation.en: Your hair remains intact.
Your hair is also
suitably appropriate.
-Thank you. -So, then, you two really have met.
-Fleetingly. -And yet memorable in its fleetingness.
Shall we go?
-We shall. -Yes.
-What? -You still have jam on your face.
[Louisa] I told you he'd be back, Anne. Why don't you sit next to him?
translation.ko: 또 올 거라고 했잖아요, 앤 그 사람 옆에 앉아요

translation.en: [Anne, sighing] Louisa.
-Do come through here. -[Mrs. Croft] Thank you so much.
Captain Wentworth, I'm going to keep you next to me.
[Frederick] Certainly.
Louisa.
How perfect.
-[Louisa] I'll sit next to you. -I'll get your chair.
Thank you very much.
Light under bushel, check.
-By the stem? -By the stem.
Quite the upgrade.
From what?
From whoever didn't want to sit next to me.
Now, tell me, do you have the same trouble with spoons?
translation.ko: 이제 말해봐요 스푼 쓰는 법도 서투른가요?

translation.en: Thank you.
[Frederick] Thank you. [Louisa] Thank you very much.
Enjoying it. It's delicious.
Captain Wentworth was telling me how he almost died at sea.
translation.ko: 대령님이 항해 중에 죽을 고비를 넘기셨대요

translation.en: My, captain! What made you decide on such a risky profession?
translation.ko: 어머나, 그런 위험한 직종을 왜 선택하셨나요?

translation.en: When I first left shore, I was in great need of distraction.
translation.ko: 어떤 기억을 잊고 싶어서 처음 배에 올랐어요

translation.en: For that, the constant threat on my life was useful.
translation.ko: 끝없는 생명의 위협이 큰 도움이 됐죠

translation.en: In fact, I was in such despair, there were times I almost wished for it.
translation.ko: 사실 너무나 괴로워서 죽고 싶은 적도 있었답니다

translation.en: Would it be too bold to ask the source of such desperation?
A woman.
Well, then, her loss.
Now, though, I've had my fill of excitement.
translation.ko: 이제 박진감 넘치는 삶은 충분히 겪었으니

translation.en: I long for absolute boredom to lull me back to myself.
translation.ko: 따분한 인생을 꾸려서 옛 자신을 되찾으려 합니다

translation.en: And by that you mean a wife?
Mother!
I mean, people and things I can be quiet with, yes.
Who better to be quiet with than a wife?
-Are you in the market for a wife, boy? -Father!
No, you found me out.
Here I am, ashore, looking to make a foolish match.
translation.ko: 미숙하지만 짝을 찾기 위해 뭍으로 돌아왔습니다

translation.en: A little kindness, a strong mind,
a few compliments to the Navy, and I'm a lost man.
translation.ko: 군에 기여한 것 말고는 보잘것없는 사람이지만

translation.en: Anyone between the ages of 18 and 80 may have me for the asking.
Almost anyone.
Charles wanted to marry me first.
[Mrs. Musgrove] What's that, Anne?
Uh, just speaking of marriage.
Remember how Charles wanted to marry me before he married Charles?
translation.ko: 다들 기억하죠? 찰스가 찰스랑 결혼하기 전…

translation.en: I mean Mary.
Sorry, Charles, um…
Before she married…
Sorry, before he, of course he,
came to his senses and married Mary.
Please go on. You'd like us to understand
that your brother-in-law once preferred you to your sister?
translation.ko: 당신 제부가 한때 자기 아내보다 당신을 더 좋아했단 거죠?

translation.en: -That's true, yes. -It's true.
Yes, it's quite right. There, there.
Wentworth isn't very gallant to you, Anne.
He said you were so altered he hardly recognized you.
translation.ko: 언니가 너무 변해서 못 알아보겠다고 하더라

translation.en: Don't worry, I stood up for you.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 내가 언니 편들어 줬어

translation.en: I told him your eye got so infected it swelled shut for a week
translation.ko: 일주일 동안 눈 못 뜰 정도로 눈병 심하게 걸려서

translation.en: and then we all called you Blackbeard.
I suppose that isn't sticking up for you so much as just saying a thing.
translation.ko: 언니 편을 든 게 아니라 아무 말이나 한 거였네

translation.en: Yes, I suppose it was more that.
More, Anne, please. Play for us, maestro.
[Anne] He was so distant last night.
I'd prefer open hostility.
His cold politeness and ceremonious grace are worse than anything.
translation.ko: 그의 싸늘한 정중함과 형식적인 격식은 최악이에요

translation.en: "Beg your pardon, Miss Elliot,
is this your chair?"
Love me, you idiot!
Love me or kill me now! I can't bear it!
Lady Macbeth.
Act three, scene four.
She'll buy it.
Oh, right.
How are you this morning, Mary?
I'm still dizzy from watching Wentworth spin Louisa around all evening.
translation.ko: 웬트워스가 루이자를 돌려대는 걸 하도 봐서 아직도 머리가 어지럽네

translation.en: Or as much as he could manage with you plonk-plonking sad-sack tunes.
translation.ko: 언니가 일부러 슬픈 곡만 연주했는데도 대단해

translation.en: "Für Elise" happens to be a great dance song
for those sophisticated enough to explore less traditional movements.
translation.ko: 신세대 춤을 탐구할 만큼 교양을 갖춘 이들에겐 그렇지

translation.en: And how would you dance to Beethoven?
translation.ko: 언니라면 베토벤 곡에 어떻게 춤출 건데?

translation.en: Alone in my room with a bottle of red.
Frederick will surely propose to Louisa.
Then they'll be married and then Louisa will be happy forever.
translation.ko: 둘은 결혼할 거고 루이자는 평생 행복하겠지

translation.en: Why must everyone always assume that all women want
translation.ko: 왜 세상 사람들은 여자의 인생 목표가

translation.en: is to be chosen by any eligible bachelor?
Because marriage is the greatest blessing that life can offer.
translation.ko: 인생이 주는 최고의 선물이 바로 결혼이니까

translation.en: Where are your children?
How should I know?
Nobody tells you when you're young that life keeps going.
translation.ko: 인생이 멈추지 않는다는 걸 어릴 땐 아무도 가르쳐주지 않아요

translation.en: It keeps going whether you approve of the progression or not.
translation.ko: 내가 변화를 좋아하든 말든 인생은 계속 흘러가죠

translation.en: [sighs] And, eventually, you find yourself wondering,
translation.ko: 그러다 어느 날 자신에게 묻게 돼요

translation.en: "How did I end up here?"
A heartbeat ago, there were no two souls more in rhythm than Wentworth and I.
translation.ko: 웬트워스와 영혼의 단짝처럼 지냈던 게 엊그제 같은데

translation.en: Now we're strangers.
Worse than strangers.
[sighs] We're exes.
[James] Auntie Anne.
-Where are you? -Come and play.
Marie Antoinette, Marie Antoinette, the people don't want you.
translation.ko: 마리 앙투아네트 백성은 널 원하지 않아

translation.en: They don't want to have a queen anymore.
How dare you speak to me that way! You are my subjects.
translation.ko: 예를 갖추지 못할까! 너흰 내 백성이니라

translation.en: Bad queen!
Bad queen? Bad subject!
-Wait, what's the words again? -Vive la révolution.
Vive la revolution!
Haha! This is mine. This is my crown.
[Anne] How dare you take my crown!
-[kids laugh] -[Anne] You got me!
-Okay. That's enough! Boys! -Bad queen!
That was quite reckless. The boy could have been hurt.
You're right. I'm sorry. We got carried away.
-Save it for Robespierre. -Frederick!
I'm doing my best.
Your best? About what?
About you and me. I don't want you to be angry.
translation.ko: 우리 둘 말이에요 당신이 화내는 건 싫어요

translation.en: What would you want me to be?
[Mary] I'm just too kind, Anne, that's my problem.
I give all of my attention to others and then I suffer for it.
translation.ko: 남들한테 한없이 관심을 줘서 이렇게 괴로운 거지

translation.en: [in Italian] How far is the Colosseum?
Mmm, you're right, but how do I prioritize self-care
translation.ko: 언니 말이 맞아 하지만 모두 내 관심을 원하면 나 자신은 언제 돌봐?

translation.en: with everyone around me constantly bidding for my attention?
translation.ko: 하지만 모두 내 관심을 원하면 나 자신은 언제 돌봐?

translation.en: [in Italian] One cappuccino, please!
What I've realized is I need to fall in love with myself first,
translation.ko: 그래서 깨달은 건데 먼저 나부터 사랑해야

translation.en: and then I can truly love those around me, and that's all there is to it.
translation.ko: 다른 사람도 진심으로 사랑할 수 있어 그게 결론이야

translation.en: [in Italian] How much is that porcupine in the window?
-[Mary] What's behind me? -[in Italian] Cheese roll?
Are you trying to go somewhere without me and gesturing to keep it a secret?
translation.ko: 나만 빼놓고 가려고 언니한테 손짓하고 있었구나?

translation.en: We are going for a-a walk, Mary.
-Very long walk. -Through the woods.
-You hate nature. -You hate moving your legs.
You made us carry you home last time.
So, you assume because I hate something I don't want to do it?
translation.ko: 싫은 건 싫은 거고 안 간다고 한 적 없는데?

translation.en: [sighs] Great.
[Mary] Bugs everywhere.
-Anne. -Hmm? There's something I've been meaning to ask you,
but I'm ashamed.
What is it?
You remember when Captain Wentworth first came
translation.ko: 웬트워스 대령님이 처음 여기 왔을 때

translation.en: and I encouraged you to pursue him?
Yes.
Well, that was before I knew him, of course.
And I genuinely hoped that you two would be a match.
Not that you seem at all interested.
-Don't I? -[Louisa] You barely look at him.
And now you'd like him for yourself?
He's everything.
You seem surprised.
I suppose I am. I thought you two were--
I don't know how he feels, but I'm falling in love.
translation.ko: 그분 마음은 모르지만 난 사랑에 빠진 것 같아요

translation.en: I've thought quite a lot about how I would feel were our roles reversed.
translation.ko: 내가 앤의 입장이면 어떨지 깊이 고민해 봤어요

translation.en: I might be hurt, perhaps even jealous,
translation.ko: 속상할 수도 심지어 질투할 수도 있겠지만

translation.en: but I can honestly say that any sorrow for myself would be entirely eclipsed
translation.ko: 앤이 행복할 수만 있다면 내가 느끼는 슬픔은

translation.en: by the pleasure I would take in seeing you happy.
-You're trying very hard here. -[Louisa laughs]
Is it working?
I don't understand why you think you need my permission
translation.ko: 왜 그 사람을 거들떠보지도 않는 나에게

translation.en: if you say I barely look at him.
Because it's the way you barely look at him.
I know what I'm watching and it's more than two people who have merely met.
translation.ko: 나도 눈치가 있고 두 사람이 단순한 지인이 아니란 건 확실해요

translation.en: What you're seeing is… the past.
Look, I believe this man could be my future.
translation.ko: 앤, 그 남자가 나의 미래일지도 몰라요

translation.en: And a frigate is larger than a sloop, correct?
-Someone's been studying. -[Frederick] Very good.
A sloop is crewed by 130 men or so, while a frigate can carry 140 to 200.
Depending on whether it's fifth or sixth rate, I suppose.
"Now May with all her smiling trains of vernal beauty sticks--"
translation.ko: '5월이 되어 어여쁜 봄 나무들이 미소 지으니…'

translation.en: That's more than enough poetry. You know how much I detest metaphor.
translation.ko: 시 낭송 그만해 내가 은유 혐오하는 거 알잖아

translation.en: [chuckling] Sorry, Mary, I'd forgotten. My mind is like a sieve.
translation.ko: 미안, 메리, 잊고 있었어 머릿속에 지우개가 있는 것 같거든

translation.en: Which is a simile, not a metaphor.
Fine. My mind is a sieve.
Whatever your mind is, stop using words imaginatively. I can't bear it.
translation.ko: 머릿속에 뭐가 들었든 그만하라니까, 짜증 나

translation.en: [Henrietta] Look! We could drop in on Harry Hayter.
Perhaps he's worked up the nerve to propose to me.
Not that I had any intention for leading us in this direction.
No, absolutely not. I will not enter the Hayter house.
translation.ko: 아니, 헤이터 집에는 죽어도 안 들어갈래

translation.en: I'm sure to contract some terrible illness. Mary, don't be ridiculous.
translation.ko: - 병이 옮을 게 분명해 - 메리, 바보처럼 굴지 마

translation.en: Is it ridiculous to care for one's health?
translation.ko: 건강 챙기는 게 바보 같은 거야?

translation.en: Households employing fewer than five servants are unsanitary.
translation.ko: 하인이 5인 미만인 가구가 비위생적이란 건 상식이야

translation.en: Please don't judge us by our poor relations, captain. It's unpleasant having such connections.
translation.ko: 변변찮은 인맥은 양해해 주세요 저희도 불쾌하답니다

translation.en: Just to be clear, you disapprove of him for your sister-in-law
because he is not wealthy enough?
[Mary] I know. It really is awful, isn't it?
Shall we?
[Louisa] It's that Elliot pride. I find it detestable.
translation.ko: 저 집안은 콧대가 높아요 진절머리가 난다니까요?

translation.en: To know Sir Walter, one might believe the title of Baronet second only to King.
translation.ko: 월터 경만 보면 준남작 서열이 왕 다음인 것 같죠

translation.en: Lord knows how sweet Anne came out of that lot.
translation.ko: 그런 집안에서 앤처럼 좋은 사람이 태어난 건 놀라운 일이에요

translation.en: We all so wish Charles had married her instead. Don't you agree?
translation.ko: 오빠는 앤과 맺어졌어야 하는데 안 그런가요?

translation.en: -Don't let her fool you. -What do you mean?
Anne Elliot has as much pride as the rest. It just takes a different form.
translation.ko: 앤도 나름 콧대가 높거든요 표현 방식이 다를 뿐이죠

translation.en: I don't understand.
Next time you witness Miss Elliot quietly installing herself
translation.ko: 한번 지켜보세요 다음에 엘리엇 양이 곤란한 상황을 마주했을 때

translation.en: on the outskirts of some social situation,
translation.ko: 다음에 엘리엇 양이 곤란한 상황을 마주했을 때

translation.en: consider whether she might assume this vantage in order to judge everyone.
translation.ko: 과연 자신에게 주어진 특권으로 남의 선한 면을 봐줄지

translation.en: Harshly.
Anne Elliot is pure kindness.
You don't know her like I do.
You are the one who is pure kindness, Louisa,
translation.ko: 천사 같다는 말은 루이자를 위한 말이죠

translation.en: and for this reason you always assume the best of others.
translation.ko: 루이자는 언제나 타인의 선한 면을 보니까요

translation.en: The truest evidence of an inferior mind
is to allow oneself to be persuaded away from one's deepest convictions.
translation.ko: 가장 깊은 신념조차도 설득에 넘어가 저버린답니다

translation.en: [Louisa] What deepest convictions?
I won't have you speak ill of Anne. She is too dear to me.
translation.ko: 앤을 험담하지 마세요 제겐 소중한 분이에요

translation.en: I don't know what happened between you and I'm not asking.
translation.ko: 두 분 일은 알지도 못하고 묻지도 않겠지만

translation.en: I do see the best in her, and I implore you to look for it too.
translation.ko: 제가 앤의 선함을 보듯 대령님도 보셨으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Please forgive me. I've been too harsh.
Thank you for calling me to task.
If I forgive you, will you teach me how to read a sextant?
translation.ko: 용서해 줄 테니 육분의 읽는 법을 알려줄래요?

translation.en: -[Frederick] On such short acquaintance? -I'm free this evening.
[Frederick] Shall we wander?
There's nothing worse than thinking your life is ruined
and then realizing you've got much, much further to fall.
translation.ko: 한참 더 떨어져야 한다는 걸 깨닫다니 정말 최악이에요

translation.en: Like I said.
[Mrs. Croft] How lovely to see you.
-She's injured. -Shall I ask her?
Anne? Anne, may we offer you a ride home?
-Thank you. I'm quite all right. -Anne, you've clearly hurt your foot.
translation.ko: - 감사하지만 전 괜찮아요 - 발을 다쳤는데 괜찮긴요

translation.en: It's hardly ten minutes out of our way. Please, come.
You're so kind. And I'm so enjoying the fresh air.
translation.ko: 정말 감사하지만 신선한 공기를 쐬고 있어요

translation.en: Must you be so proud?
Please, let this be easy.
James.
Come here.
I need a favor from you. Do you think you can help?
translation.ko: 이모가 부탁이 있는데 도와줄 수 있겠니?

translation.en: I need you to hug me so tightly that I can't feel my body anymore.
translation.ko: 내 몸이 으스러질 정도로 꼭 껴안아 주는 거야

translation.en: -Do you think you can do that? -Mm-hmm.
James, tea time.
Anne. Anne, we are going to Lyme. Tomorrow.
translation.ko: 앤? 앤, 내일 라임에 갈 거예요

translation.en: It's been decided. We'll spend the night by the sea.
To Lyme? Why?
Captain Wentworth wants us to meet some of his Navy friends.
-I'm not quite up for a trip, I'm afraid. -What?
translation.ko: - 난 별로 안 가고 싶네 - 뭐라고요?

translation.en: Anne, we're going to Lyme tomorrow. I need 24 hours away from the terrors.
translation.ko: 앤, 우리 내일 라임 갈 거야 이 지옥 같은 일상을 24시간만 벗어나야겠어

translation.en: No, wait.
Mary, I'm not--
No. You're always out to ruin my fun and I won't have it.
translation.ko: 아니, 맨날 분위기 잡치는데 이번만큼은 안 돼

translation.en: I need a holiday, and I need you with me
translation.ko: 난 휴가가 필요하고 휴가엔 언니가 있어야 해

translation.en: to have someone to talk at when the others stop feeling obligated.
translation.ko: 남들이 나랑 얘기하기 싫어할 때 언니가 내 말 상대 해줘야지

translation.en: Shockingly self-aware.
Captain, this is Anne Elliot.
Anne Elliot.
Captain Harville.
Pleasure to meet you.
Please excuse me.
Now, you are a fan of poetry. Or is that just a rumor?
You seem to know more of me than I can hardly be comfortable with.
translation.ko: 저에 대해 불편할 정도로 잘 알고 계신 것 같네요

translation.en: Forgive me, I'm just hatching a plot.
-You see our friend over there? -Yes.
[Harville] Captain Benwick.
Now, Captain Benwick has also considerable taste in reading.
But he has fallen into a sadness.
I wondered if you might take a moment to talk to him?
translation.ko: 잠시나마 말동무가 되어 주실 수 있을까요?

translation.en: I can build a house out of driftwood, but don't ever ask me about the Greeks.
translation.ko: 전 맨손으로 집도 짓지만 책은 생각만 해도 어지럽거든요

translation.en: [Anne laughs] What's the source of his sorrow?
Home from Troy and there's another man in his bed? [laughs]
translation.ko: 트로이에서 돌아왔더니 침대에 딴 남자가 있었나요?

translation.en: Sorry, Agamemnon joke.
He was engaged to my sister Fanny.
And they were very much in love.
And she died while he was at sea, just before they were set to be married.
translation.ko: 혼례를 앞두고 항해 중일 때 동생이 세상을 떠났죠

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
They say the universe always has a plan.
-[Harville] So, will you? Speak to him. -I'd be happy to.
Though I'm not sure I'm the messenger the universe has in mind.
translation.ko: 제가 저분과 얘기하는 게 우주의 계획인진 모르겠지만요

translation.en: Trust me, it's never wrong.
All that is meant for one is meant to find one.
translation.ko: 짝을 찾을 운명이라면 언젠가 찾게 돼 있어요

translation.en: I promise.
And while you're at it, convince our friend Wentworth that he'd be a fool to ignore the Navy much longer.
translation.ko: 멍청한 웬트워스한테 이제는 군으로 복귀하라고도 전해주세요

translation.en: -I hate to see a talent wasted. -[laughs]
If only I had influence.
translation.ko: - 제 말을 들어야 말이죠 - 술에 취하게만 해주면

translation.en: Tonight at dinner? You get him drunk. I'll smuggle him aboard.
translation.ko: - 제 말을 들어야 말이죠 - 술에 취하게만 해주면 - 제가 배까지 업고 갈게요 - 루이자한테 부탁해 봐요

translation.en: Perhaps you should ask Louisa.
translation.ko: - 제가 배까지 업고 갈게요 - 루이자한테 부탁해 봐요

translation.en: I'm asking you.
Shall we?
[Harville] Not tempted to have a dip in the water, are you?
Thank you. Promise?
Come on, Mary.
Wentworth, of course, refused to admit that he had got the coordinates wrong.
translation.ko: 웬트워스가 좌표를 틀려놓고 인정을 안 하지 뭡니까!

translation.en: Captain Wentworth is very stubborn.
Stubborn indeed. He could be an admiral some day,
great service to the Crown and all that it holds dear,
translation.ko: 왕실에 기여하고 부귀영화를 누릴 수 있는데

translation.en: but instead he'd rather fart around inland for the rest of his life.
translation.ko: 죽는 날까지 육지에서 방귀나 뀌며 살겠다잖아요

translation.en: Oh, let the man fart where he likes.
I would like to have a family one day.
As you well know,
the wife of a sailor pays a tax for her husband's chosen path.
translation.ko: 선원의 아내는 남편이 택한 길에 대가를 치르며 살아야 하죠

translation.en: It is but a small fee.
Constant worry. I'd hate to ask that of anyone.
translation.ko: 아내에게 끝없는 걱정을 끼치고 싶진 않아요

translation.en: That's ridiculous.
No life is without worry.
Harville is right.
Anne.
Your future wife will be perfectly capable of managing her own feelings.
translation.ko: 미래의 아내는 자기 감정을 알아서 다스릴 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: Don't patronize her by deciding for her what worries she can and cannot endure.
translation.ko: 감당 못 할 거라고 넘겨짚지 말았으면 해요

translation.en: Who knows?
Perhaps she'll even be forging her own adventures at home.
[Harville] Right, who wants more wine? [Henrietta] Yes. Yes.
-Yeah? Okay, good. -Yes. Yes.
[Anne] Lord Byron.
"She was my life's unerring light."
"That quench'd, what beams shall break my night."
Yes. [sighs] He's got me through a self-pitying night or two.
translation.ko: 맞아요 저도 바이런을 읽고 자기 연민에 빠져 밤을 지새웠었죠

translation.en: I often think it is the great misfortune of poetry
translation.ko: 시의 안타까운 점은 시를 즐길 줄 아는 사람도

translation.en: that it's seldom enjoyed safely
by those capable of enjoying it completely.
Only people who know loss
can really appreciate Byron.
But those people should only taste him sparingly.
translation.ko: 하지만 그의 시에 너무 빠져들어선 안 돼요

translation.en: Otherwise, they'll be left more deeply in their sorrow.
translation.ko: 그러다간 슬픔에 더욱 깊이 잠길 테니까요

translation.en: -Then, what are those people meant to do? -[Anne chuckles]
Honestly, I've been trying to work that out for eight years now.
translation.ko: 솔직히 저도 8년 동안 그 답을 찾아 헤맸어요

translation.en: I can only tell you what I must repeat to myself daily.
translation.ko: 매일 스스로 되새기는 말만 해드릴 수 있겠네요

translation.en: You're young. You don't know what the future has in store.
You will rally, and you will be happy again.
-Perhaps you're right. -[Anne] I know I am.
-Thank you, Miss Elliot. -[chuckles]
I'm only saying, the lower ranks are taxed disproportionately.
translation.ko: 내 말은 신분에 따른 세율이 공평하지 않다는 거야

translation.en: -[Louisa] Who is that? -Pardon me. I think I'm in your way.
Perhaps you can correct that.
Perhaps.
Hello.
Can I help you with something?
Considering what I'd like help with, probably not.
translation.ko: 아무래도 그쪽은 저를 못 도와줄 것 같습니다

translation.en: Hello.
Hello.
-I'm sorry about this morning. -What happened this morning?
translation.ko: 아침 일은 미안했어요 - 무슨 일이 있었죠? - 무례했던 남자 말입니다

translation.en: I'm speaking of that rude gentleman we encountered.
translation.ko: - 무슨 일이 있었죠? - 무례했던 남자 말입니다

translation.en: I'm not your older brother. You don't need my protection.
translation.ko: 당신이 내 동생도 아니고 내가 지켜줄 필요는 없죠

translation.en: In any event, you've never had trouble speaking for yourself.
No apology necessary.
It was clearly well intended.
Look, we haven't really had a chance to talk.
I've lived with a thousand different imagined versions of you over the years.
translation.ko: 그동안 당신의 모습을 수도 없이 상상하며 살았어요

translation.en: Some to rail against.
Some to cherish.
Likewise.
I didn't know if I'd ever see you again.
translation.ko: 당신을 다시는 못 볼 줄 알았어요

translation.en: Or if you knew how much I cared.
translation.ko: 내 마음을 평생 몰라줄 것 같았죠

translation.en: I think I always knew.
There's no one quite like you.
And it's clear to me that I want you in my life.
translation.ko: 어떤 사이로 지내든 당신이 내 곁에 있었으면 해요

translation.en: No matter what form that takes. Bury the past and…
translation.ko: 어떤 사이로 지내든 당신이 내 곁에 있었으면 해요 지난 일은 묻어 두고…

translation.en: I suppose what I'm getting at is, um…
I…
I would like to be friends.
I was… I was thinking the same.
I saw so clearly this morning the prison
translation.ko: 내가 원망의 감옥에 갇혀 죄인처럼 살았다는 걸

translation.en: my resentment had created.
I genuinely hope you find love wherever you need to find it.
translation.ko: 당신이 원하는 짝을 찾기를 진심으로 바랄게요

translation.en: And I thank you,
from the bottom of my heart, for your offer of friendship.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Well…
Excellent.
Good… talk.
[Anne] I really do hope you'll be open to pursuing the admiralty.
translation.ko: 난 당신이 제독이 되는 길을 포기하지 않았으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Everyone speaks to your genius.
I'm sure they understate it.
They don't really know who I am or what would make me happy.
translation.ko: 동료들은 내가 누구이고 뭘 원하는지 알지 못하죠

translation.en: Well, I do.
I know you.
And I know you want a life of consequence.
And I know you'd be brilliant.
translation.ko: 당신은 잘 해낼 수 있을 거예요

translation.en: -You want to know a secret? -Always.
My most grim moments at sea,
when I felt completely lost and confused
translation.ko: 이 길이 내 길이 아닌가 혼란스럽고

translation.en: and inadequate,
translation.ko: 이 길이 내 길이 아닌가 혼란스럽고 방황할 때

translation.en: I would ask myself,
"What would Anne do here?"
That's how I'd know how to proceed.
Pretending I was you.
-You lie. -I truth.
You're always best in an emergency.
Anticipating the needs of others.
Direct and focused, calm and thoughtful.
translation.ko: 똑 부러지고, 집중력 있고 차분하고, 사려 깊고

translation.en: Equipped with more intelligence than does you good.
No, you're an exceptional person.
It angers me the world denies you the chance of a public life.
translation.ko: 당신이 사회에 진출하지 못해 화가 날 정도예요

translation.en: You'd make a great admiral.
Thanks.
Don't go out too far. There's riptides and such.
translation.ko: 물살이 세니까 너무 멀리 나가진 마요

translation.en: Sorry. There I go trying to protect you again.
As you were.
Now we're worse than exes.
We're friends.
Now you are in my way.
-Excuse me. -Before you go,
allow me a proper introduction.
Or is your minder waiting round the corner to tell me off again?
translation.ko: 또 경호원이 나타나서 저를 야단치지는 않겠죠?

translation.en: He's my friend,
and I believe he misconstrued your intentions.
translation.ko: 그리고 그땐 당신의 의도를 오해했나 봐요

translation.en: My intentions were construed most accurately.
translation.ko: 사실 그분은 제 의도를 정확히 짚으셨어요

translation.en: I intended for you to notice me.
Miss?
Miss.
-Simple. I like it. -Mm-hmm.
Will I see you again?
We must entrust that to providence.
That means I haven't yet made up my mind.
What?
What is it, Anne?
[Anne] The man we passed yesterday.
Excuse me. Can you tell me the name of the gentleman who just left?
translation.ko: 저기요, 방금 나가신 분의 성함을 알 수 있을까요?

translation.en: That's Mr. William Walter Elliot, miss, en route to Bath.
translation.ko: 윌리엄 월터 엘리엇 씨예요 바스로 가시는 중이죠

translation.en: Of course he drives off just as I get to the window.
-A cousin? -Not just a cousin, Henrietta.
Our father's heir. We should write to Father at once.
translation.ko: 아버지의 상속인이지 빨리 아버지한테 편지 쓰자

translation.en: That news would not be welcome, Mary, as well you know.
-[Mary] He'll be furious. -[Henrietta] What happened between them?
translation.ko: 분노하시겠지 - 어떤 인연이길래? - 말도 안 섞는 사이지

translation.en: -My father and Mr. Elliot do not speak. -[gasps]
translation.ko: - 어떤 인연이길래? - 말도 안 섞는 사이지

translation.en: -I love a little bit of family gossip. -[Louisa] Tell us.
Mr. Elliot will inherit the baronetcy and the estate no matter what.
translation.ko: 엘리엇 씨는 상속인이라 작위와 저택을 물려받게 돼 있어

translation.en: Father was desperate that he marry Elizabeth
to keep the title within his direct line.
translation.ko: 자기 핏줄이 작위를 물려받게 하려고 했지

translation.en: [Anne] But he turned her down.
We learned that he had married an American woman who nobody knew.
translation.ko: 우리가 모르는 미국 여자랑 결혼했지 뭐야

translation.en: Father threw a platter of canapés across the room.
translation.ko: 아버지가 그 얘기 듣고 은쟁반을 던진 거 있지?

translation.en: -Wasn't Mr. Elliot in mourning clothes? -His wife's dead.
You must hate him for all the embarrassment he's caused your family.
translation.ko: 가문의 명예에 먹칠한 남자라 맘에 안 들겠네요

translation.en: Actually, so far it's his most winning quality.
translation.ko: 사실 그 점이 가장 마음에 들어

translation.en: He's a lucky man to have met Louisa.
Hmm. Has he said anything to you about how he feels?
No, she has.
[woman] It's quite steep. Careful.
Thank you.
Do be careful.
-Catch me, Captain. -[Frederick] Oh, goodness.
Okay, that was your warm-up. Once more.
translation.ko: 방금 건 몸풀기였어요 한 번 더 가요

translation.en: No, Louisa, that's enough. No more.
I'm jumping, so either catch me or don't.
translation.ko: 난 뛸 거니까 받을 테면 받아봐요

translation.en: -Louisa! -No, no, no, no.
-Louisa! -[Anne] No. Don't move her. Louisa?
Can you hear me? Uh, we need a doctor.
translation.ko: 내 말이 들려? 의사를 불러야 돼

translation.en: I'll go.
No, someone who knows the town. Benwick, get a doctor.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 길을 모르잖아요 벤윅 대령님이 가주세요

translation.en: -Hurry! -[Anne] Louisa.
-Anne, tell me what can I do? -Just be patient.
translation.ko: - 앤, 난 뭘 하면 될까요? - 침착하게 기다려요

translation.en: [Anne] She's still breathing. It's all right, she's breathing.
[doctor] She's had quite a severe concussion.
But I've seen far greater injuries recovered from.
There's reason to be hopeful.
-Leave her to rest now. -[Mrs. Harville] Yes.
-[doctor] She can stay here? -Of course.
No, you've been so kind, we can't continue to impose.
translation.ko: 이미 신세 졌는데 그럴 수는 없어요

translation.en: She'll stay as long as she needs.
Whoever doesn't mind a spot on the floor is welcome to stay with her.
translation.ko: 마루의 얼룩만 안 거슬린다면 같이 계셔도 좋고요

translation.en: Anne should stay. To assist you, Mrs. Harville.
No one so capable, so perfect as Anne.
-You will stay, won't you? -Of course.
I can't bear to leave until she's awake.
[Frederick] I'll deliver news to the Musgroves.
-Thank you. -Thank you.
Would you be so kind as to escort Mary and Henrietta?
translation.ko: 메리와 헨리에타를 데려가 주실 수 있을까요?

translation.en: Escort me?
The children, Mary.
We can't have them stay with my parents an extra night. Nearly burned the house down last time.
translation.ko: 지난번엔 불이 날 뻔했는데 부모님 댁에서 얼른 데려와야지

translation.en: Why should Anne stay? Anne who means nothing to Louisa.
translation.ko: 앤은 왜 안 가는데? 루이자랑 아무 사이도 아니잖아

translation.en: -Oh, Mary. -It was my understanding, Mary,
that you suffered from an allergy to houses of fewer than five servants.
translation.ko: 하인이 5인 이하인 가정에 알레르기가 있을 텐데요

translation.en: Aren't you worried you'll contract something?
I'm not leaving. Have a good journey, Anne.
translation.ko: 난 안 가, 언니나 조심해서 돌아가

translation.en: It's not your fault. You told her not to leap.
translation.ko: 당신 잘못 아니에요 뛰지 말라고 했잖아요

translation.en: In words, yes.
-But in other ways… -In other ways?
I led her to believe I was a person who was prepared to catch her.
translation.ko: 내가 자기를 받아줄 사람이라고 믿게 만들었어요

translation.en: How exactly did you do that?
I knew she was infatuated
and yet did nothing to discourage her.
Clearly, it led to this.
Had this not occurred,
one can only imagine what our lives might have been.
translation.ko: 이 일이 있기 전으로는 되돌아갈 수 없어요

translation.en: Now I'm responsible for her.
How do I tell her parents?
Calmly.
Be direct.
Offer whatever services they may require of you.
Good luck.
What will you do now?
I need to go to Bath.
Thank you.
For everything.
How is it
that life can remain static,
translation.ko: 그 오랜 세월 동안 멈춰 있으면서

translation.en: almost obstinately resistant to any change for years at a time, and then…
without warning become flooded with so much newness
translation.ko: 낯선 일들이 파도처럼 예고 없이 밀려드는 걸까요?

translation.en: within the course of a few weeks?
It's impossible to recall life before the torrents.
translation.ko: 인생의 급류를 피할 방법은 없어 보이네요

translation.en: [Lady Russell] That poor girl. How are her parents?
[Anne] In shock, but trying to stay hopeful.
translation.ko: 많이 놀라셨지만 희망을 잃지 않으려 하세요

translation.en: [Lady Russell] Well, that's all they can do.
Now, where are they?
Where are they?
-It's fine, we don't need them. -[sighs]
I wanted it to be perfect for you.
Don't be silly, I'm happy just to be here with you.
No, no, no. It's not a picnic without macaroons.
translation.ko: 아니, 피크닉에 마카롱이 빠지면 안 되지

translation.en: Henry would have thrown a fit if they'd forgotten to pack the dessert.
Well, lucky for you, I don't really care for macaroons.
-Hmm. -And I'm not Henry.
No.
Nobody is.
Do you ever think about spending time with someone else?
translation.ko: 다른 분과 함께할 생각은 안 해보셨어요?

translation.en: Several men have offered.
Do you know whose company I enjoy?
translation.ko: 내가 누구랑 있을 때 제일 행복할까?

translation.en: My own.
There's a reason widowed men die soonest and unmarried women live longest.
translation.ko: 왜 홀아비가 일찍 죽고 독신 여성은 오래 살겠니?

translation.en: We're great company.
But do you ever miss… company?
Why do you think I take so many European tours?
translation.ko: 내가 유럽 여행을 자주 가는 이유가 뭘까?

translation.en: Lady Russell!
I hope I haven't eaten too much. There's sure to be a feast tonight.
translation.ko: 적당히 먹을 걸 그랬나? 진수성찬을 차려놨을 텐데

translation.en: We're to meet the famous Mr. Elliot.
But why is he courting Father's favor now?
Well, Elizabeth, of course, assumes it is she who motivates him
translation.ko: 엘리자베스는 당연히 매력 넘치는 자기를 보러

translation.en: with all of her charms.
Mr. Elliot has nothing to gain from my father.
translation.ko: 엘리엇 씨는 아버지한테 얻을 게 없잖아요

translation.en: He is richer than him and will inherit his title no matter what.
translation.ko: 재산도 더 많고 언젠가 작위도 이어받을 텐데

translation.en: -He must be after something. -Why are you so suspicious of him?
translation.ko: - 노리는 게 있는 거예요 - 왜 그리 의심을 해?

translation.en: Because anyone that attractive must have an angle.
translation.ko: 그렇게 매력적인 사람은 분명 꿍꿍이가 있어요

translation.en: -What are you keeping from me? -I've seen Mr. Elliot.
translation.ko: - 내가 모르는 게 있구나? - 엘리엇 씨를 만났어요

translation.en: And he's attractive.
Very attractive.
You met him?
In Lyme, though neither of us knew who we were meeting.
-Do I sense a romance brewing? -That's not going to happen.
translation.ko: 이거 느낌이 오는데? 그럴 일은 없을 거예요

translation.en: -Because? -Because he is a ten.
I never trust a ten.
[Lady Russell] This is you.
[Anne] This is his idea of downsizing?
[Lady Russell] It's a start.
Don't make me.
Courage, ma chérie.
I'll see you tonight.
-Anne! I'm so happy to see you. -What do you mean by that?
translation.ko: 앤! 너무 잘 왔어 그게 무슨 뜻이야?

translation.en: Mr. Elliot is on his way and I want him to see what I look like next to you.
translation.ko: 네가 왔으니 엘리엇 씨 눈에 내 미모가 돋보일 거 아냐

translation.en: -It's good to be home. -Just think.
He's been nursing a crush on me for nearly a decade.
Poor man. How he must have suffered.
All the way through a marriage he ran away from you to secure.
translation.ko: 그래, 언니 두고 도망쳐서 결혼 생활 하느라 괴로웠겠다

translation.en: Isn't it mad? He must have presumed I was out of his league.
translation.ko: 황당하지 않니? 내가 과분하다고 생각했나 봐

translation.en: I can't imagine any other reason.
I'm never quite sure whether you're insulting me,
translation.ko: 날 욕하는 건지 헷갈릴 때가 있는데

translation.en: but I value your regard so little that I don't mind either way.
translation.ko: 네 생각은 안 궁금해서 신경도 안 쓰여

translation.en: Ah, Anne. Is that what you're wearing?
Mr. Elliot will be here any moment.
I was surprised, Father, to learn how forgiving you've been after all he made you suffer.
translation.ko: 아버지를 괴롭힌 사람인데 어떻게 벌써 잊을 수 있어요?

translation.en: Suffer?
Well, there were many insults.
He denies making them.
Father, he made them to you.
He was very strong in his denial.
Oh, that's him.
Get the door, Anne. And don't slouch.
translation.ko: 문 열어줘라, 앤 허리 곧게 펴고

translation.en: Hurry up!
Gosh.
Thank you.
It seems like providence plays for my team after all.
I'm your cousin, Anne.
Cousin? Interesting.
It's a decided step up from passerby, but still a bit short of "most beloved".
translation.ko: 길 가다 마주친 사람보다는 가까워졌지만 '연인'과는 거리가 좀 있군요

translation.en: But I am willing to work for my titles.
Imagine my luck, a flirt and a hard worker.
Don't forget rich.
Lucky we have you to remind us.
What in God's name is happening?
Don't worry, darling, he's just practicing on me.
Shall we?
I understand you've been visiting my sister quite often.
She is delighted by the attention.
Well, it's nice to hear that your sister is capable of delight.
translation.ko: 기쁨을 느낄 줄 아는 분이라니 그것참 다행입니다

translation.en: But romance has been the last thing from my mind.
Until today.
Well, if you haven't been coming for the purpose of courtship, then…
-[Elliot] Mrs. Clay, of course. -Mrs. Clay?
About a month ago, I received word that my uncle had appeared in Bath
translation.ko: 한 달 전에 어르신께서 낮은 신분의 여인과 함께

translation.en: in the company of a woman of low birth.
Many presumed she was after his hand. Now, that marriage would be a scandal.
translation.ko: 부인 뜻대로 두 분이 재혼하면 엄청난 파장을 일으키겠죠

translation.en: You're concerned for my father's reputation?
Oh, no, not at all.
My concern is that he will have a son and that son will rob me of my title
translation.ko: 둘의 재혼으로 아들이 태어나고 그 애가 내 작위와 재산을 빼앗는 걸 염려하는 겁니다

translation.en: and my estate.
translation.ko: 그 애가 내 작위와 재산을 빼앗는 걸 염려하는 겁니다

translation.en: And my plan is to block that by any means necessary.
translation.ko: 무슨 수를 써서라도 그런 불상사는 막아야죠

translation.en: I told you, I'm willing to work for my titles.
I have to say, I am impressed by your openness.
translation.ko: 당신의 솔직함에 감탄하지 않을 수가 없네요

translation.en: Refreshing, yes?
I'm so glad to see you again.
I heard about that terrible accident that befell your party after I left Lyme.
translation.ko: 제가 라임을 떠난 후에 불행한 사고가 있었다지요?

translation.en: How is she?
She's still confined to her bed, but much recovered.
translation.ko: 아직 침상에 누워 있지만 많이 나아졌어요

translation.en: I received word this morning.
Thank you for asking.
-You must have suffered terribly. -I suffered the least, truly.
You have a gentle soul. You feel deeply for those around you.
translation.ko: 앤은 상냥한 마음씨를 지녀서 주변 사람들을 끔찍이 아끼죠

translation.en: I imagine it was quite an ordeal. I regret you had to go through it.
translation.ko: 분명 힘들었을 텐데 그런 일을 겪다니 안타까워요

translation.en: Thank you.
So good, darling.
-Go forth. You have my blessing. -I wouldn't do anything without it.
translation.ko: - 가세요, 허락해 줄게요 - 허락해서 가는 겁니다

translation.en: -Bravo! -Bravo!
[Elliot] Bravo. Very well played, madam.
He means to disarm me with candor.
translation.ko: 솔직한 대화로 내 마음을 공략하려나 본데

translation.en: It isn't working. [chuckles]
Yet.
Probably won't.
Right?
Ow.
-What? -Joy.
Pardon me, I'm experiencing joy.
The dowager Viscountess Dalrymple and her daughter,
translation.ko: 미망인이신 달림플 자작 부인과 그분의 영애 카터렛 양께서

translation.en: the honorable Miss Carteret,
are in Bath.
Do you rehearse this stuff while I'm sleeping?
Our dear cousins!
Cousins? I love cousins!
Cousin is a term most accurately applied to those within one's family tree,
translation.ko: 가계도 한 장 안에 들어와야 사촌이라고 불러주지

translation.en: not those within one's family forest.
The Dalrymples don't have the slightest notion that we exist.
With the help of a few visual aids,
I bet we could explain the connections most comprehensively
translation.ko: 혈연관계를 알기 쉽게 증명할 수 있을 것 같은데?

translation.en: within three quarters of an hour.
-But why? -[Sir Walter] Why?
These people are nobility. Everyone will want to be seen with them.
translation.ko: 그 사람들은 귀족들이야 모두가 어울리고 싶어 하지

translation.en: What's the advantage of being seen with them?
Anne, don't be deliberately dense.
Quick! Break out your finest frocks.
translation.ko: 빨리! 가장 귀한 옷들 꺼내 입어

translation.en: We are about to touch… greatness.
Sometimes, I have this dream
that a giant octopus is sucking my face and, as I struggle to get free,
translation.ko: 거대한 문어가 내 얼굴을 빨아 먹는데 벗어나려고 보니까

translation.en: I realize that my, my hands are tentacles
and I can't push it off.
And then I realize, of course, that I am
the octopus, and I am
sucking my own
face.
Much like in life.
So often those we perceive as our greatest adversaries
translation.ko: 종종 나의 최대의 적이라고 생각했던 인물들이

translation.en: are just shadow versions of ourselves.
Well put, Mr. Elliot.
Perhaps the next time you meet an octopus, Miss Elliot,
translation.ko: 다음에 엘리엇 양께서 또 문어를 만나신다면

translation.en: you should embrace him, rather than try to detach.
Wrap those wily tendrils right around him
translation.ko: 그 간사한 촉수들로 문어를 감싼 다음

translation.en: and let yourself be taken.
In your dreams, Mr. Elliot.
And also in mine.
It was on account of eating some cheese
a bit too close to bedtime.
-Oh. -Well, that went splendidly.
I knew it would. [laughs]
Your charms are irresistible, Sir Walter, even to nobility. [laughs]
translation.ko: 월터 경의 치명적인 매력이 귀족들에게도 먹히는 거죠

translation.en: Your noble relations disappoint you.
That awful woman cannot marry your father. Ugh.
translation.ko: 저 끔찍한 여인에게 아버님을 넘길 순 없죠

translation.en: [Anne] Tell me something.
You'd honestly rather prevent Mrs. Clay from taking my father's arm
than talk with me?
My dear octopus, it's not even close.
translation.ko: 나의 문어 아가씨 비교할 바가 못 되죠

translation.en: You know…
you're beginning to grow on me.
Now I'm suspicious.
[Elliot] Fascinating.
[Lady Russell giggles] Must everyone be interesting?
[Anne] Not at all. They are free to be as boring as they like
translation.ko: 되죠, 지루하게 살든 말든 상관 안 할 테니까

translation.en: so long as I am not asked to sit with them.
And him?
He provided some relief. More than I anticipated.
He spoke quite highly of you to me the other night. I believe there is some attachment.
translation.ko: 저번에 너를 좋게 얘기하더라 애착을 느끼는 것 같던데?

translation.en: Mr. Elliot could attach to a potato if it suited him.
Though Elizabeth may find some satisfaction living at home forever,
translation.ko: 엘리자베스는 평생을 집에서 혼자 살아도 만족하겠지만

translation.en: that life will lock you in deadness.
All I'm saying is, I hope you will accept Mr. Elliot
translation.ko: 내가 하고 싶은 말은 엘리엇 씨가 청혼한다면

translation.en: if he makes an offer.
Based on your extensive knowledge of him?
I may not have extensive knowledge of him, but I have extensive knowledge of you.
translation.ko: 그분은 잘 모르지만 너라면 속속들이 잘 알지

translation.en: Not only is he rich and well-mannered,
translation.ko: 돈도 많고 점잖은 사람일 뿐만 아니라

translation.en: I believe you've taken an interest in him.
I would never have recommended it otherwise.
I'll admit, there is something there.
But, for once, I'm asking you to trust that I have the resources to make my own decisions.
translation.ko: 하지만 이번만큼은 저를 믿고 직접 결정할 수 있게 해주세요

translation.en: I must rely on the instructions issued by my own heart.
translation.ko: 제 가슴이 시키는 대로 따라야만 해요

translation.en: I tried the alternative once and I'll never forgive myself for it.
translation.ko: 그러지 않았던 과거의 내가 얼마나 미운지 몰라요

translation.en: You mean you'll never forgive me.
I just thought, under the circumstances…
Circumstances?
[Lady Russell] The engagement, of course. Wentworth and Louisa.
Oh, I thought you knew.
Everyone is talking about Louisa and her captain.
translation.ko: 다들 루이자와 대령의 약혼 얘기만 하길래…

translation.en: Oh, darling.
What can I do?
[exhales] I'd just like to be alone.
Well, I'm here when you want me.
I always imagined myself
confronting this moment
with grace.
I would astonish myself and others with my…
My quiet dignity.
My ability to endure.
Statues would be erected in my name.
"In memory of Anne Elliot,
who suffered cosmic loss
yet really held it together quite impressively."
Anne.
-You're here. -Yes, it appears I am.
-Are you alone? -Mm.
I'm just waiting for a friend.
I see.
We got caught in the rain. He's gone to fetch a carriage.
translation.ko: 갑자기 비가 와서 마차를 부르러 갔어요

translation.en: He's quite charming.
-Well, I'm pleased to hear that. -He makes me laugh.
It's nice to laugh. [laughs]
Apparently, you've yet to hear about the engagement. I'm--
translation.ko: 아직 약혼 소식을 못 들었을 텐데…

translation.en: I'm sorry, the horses were a nightmare in the rain.
translation.ko: 미안해요, 말들이 비 때문에 난리를 피워서

translation.en: -Uh, Mr. Elliot, allow me to introduce-- -We remember each other.
We do.
Th-this is Captain Wentworth.
Yes, your good friend Captain Wentworth.
I'm glad to have the opportunity to, uh, apologize for my behavior in Lyme.
translation.ko: 라임에서 저지른 무례에 대해 사과드리고 싶었습니다

translation.en: It was on account of being struck by this
translation.ko: 제 옆에 있는 눈부신 피조물의 광경에

translation.en: dazzling creature.
Please don't call me a creature.
This dazzling, um…
[Anne] Woman? Woman?
-What's wrong with creature? -We'll talk about it later.
What is taking you two so long?
Um, just one second. One second.
There's a concert tomorrow. Will you join us?
-Oh, I'd hate to intrude. -On what?
You'll come, then. Excellent.
We'll be a foursome. You, she, the bel canto and me.
translation.ko: 저와 대령님, 엘리엇 양과 벨칸토의 4중창이 되겠군요

translation.en: He's quite original, isn't he?
Unique, even.
It's good to see you happy.
Thanks.
I hope you're happy too.
Anne, I think we should be going.
I'll see you tomorrow.
[Elizabeth] Anne! Hurry up!
Good evening.
Shall we?
How's Louisa?
Very much recovered.
And yet still healing slowly.
It's going to take time and love to see her through.
Good.
So long as you're in Bath, I hope we can see a bit of one another.
translation.ko: 당신이 바스에 있는 동안 계속 볼 수 있겠네요?

translation.en: I'm actually not sure how long I'll be here.
I'm in the throes of a difficult decision. Been offered a position aboard a ship.
translation.ko: 어려운 결정을 앞두고 고민하는 중이죠 승선 제안을 받았거든요

translation.en: She sets sail for Malta Saturday, so I don't have long to make up my mind.
translation.ko: 토요일에 몰타로 떠난다고 하니 빨리 결정해야 해요

translation.en: -Well, that sounds exciting. -Indeed it does.
translation.ko: 재밌는 여정이 될 것 같네요 그렇겠죠

translation.en: I love my work and I'm happy for the opportunity to serve, but--
translation.ko: 난 이 일을 사랑하고 기꺼이 조국에 헌신할…

translation.en: I'm sorry to interrupt, but I need to steal my Anne for a moment.
translation.ko: 방해해서 미안한데 잠시 제 앤을 데려가야겠어요

translation.en: Fluent in Italian too, would you believe it?
-Uh, we need help translating the program. -Just one moment.
Anne, we need you to do Italian for our cousins.
I do hope you'll be able to make it to the wedding.
Anne would be devastated if you weren't there.
translation.ko: 안 오시면 앤의 마음이 찢어질 거예요

translation.en: I know how much she values your friendship.
Frederick!
I was hoping we could continue our conversation.
translation.ko: 아까 하던 얘기 마저 했으면 좋겠는데요

translation.en: Sadly, I'm not sure there will be another opportunity.
translation.ko: 하긴 이런 기회는 다시 안 올 것 같아요

translation.en: I've just made up my mind. I'm off to sea. Much to put in order before Saturday.
translation.ko: 방금 출항을 결심했거든요 토요일 전에 준비할 게 많네요

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm interrupting again.
No, no, no. I'm afraid it is I who is interrupting.
Enjoy the second act.
[Mr. Elliot] We will.
-I didn't mean to upset-- -If you would just let me speak.
translation.ko: - 저 때문에 화난 건… - 제 말부터 들어보세요

translation.en: You interrupted me. Let me say what's on my mind first.
translation.ko: 앤이 말을 끊었잖아요 제가 먼저 말할게요

translation.en: I'm new to these genuine feelings.
translation.ko: 이런 진솔한 감정이 제겐 낯설게 느껴져요

translation.en: I'm trying to learn from you, for you.
translation.ko: 그래서 앤에게 배우는 중이죠 앤을 위해서요

translation.en: You're far too good for me and I'm terrified.
translation.ko: 앤은 제게 과분하고 그래서 겁이 나지만

translation.en: But I want very much to make you my wife.
Nothing else would make me happier.
-Your wife? -Yes. You don't have to answer now.
translation.ko: 아내라고요? 네, 지금 답할 필요는 없지만

translation.en: But please, think on it.
The captain was right, you know.
The gentleman is indeed unique.
Charles, hurry up!
The journey gave me dead leg. I need you to massage it.
translation.ko: 먼 길 오느라 다리가 저리네 언니가 주물러 줘

translation.en: Mary, what are you doing here?
Uh, coming to fetch you, of course.
You need to come to the inn with Charles and me to listen to me talk.
translation.ko: 우리 숙소로 와서 내 얘기 좀 들어줘

translation.en: We're here for a little visit.
Ever since Louisa's accident, life just seems so fragile and fleeting.
translation.ko: 루이자가 다친 후로 삶이 덧없게 느껴지는 거 있지?

translation.en: It's made me realize how important it is to spend time away from one's children.
translation.ko: 자식들과 떨어져 있는 시간이 필요하다는 걸 깨달았어

translation.en: And it's dreadfully unfair that you and Elizabeth are up here gallivanting
translation.ko: 게다가 언니 둘은 엘리엇 씨랑 고귀한 사촌들이랑

translation.en: with Mr. Elliot and our noble cousins
and I haven't even been introduced to them yet,
despite being the most accomplished decoupage artist of the three of us. Hmm?
translation.ko: 손재주는 내가 셋 중에서 제일 좋은데 이게 말이 돼?

translation.en: Oh, Anne, have you heard?
Louisa will marry a sailor
and Henrietta that soiled napkin of a curate, Henry Hayter.
translation.ko: 헨리에타는 그 지저분한 부목사 헨리 헤이터랑 결혼한대

translation.en: Mary, remember your list.
Oh, right.
My doctor thinks I might benefit from embodying gratitude.
translation.ko: 감사한 것들을 떠올리면 나한테 도움이 될 거래

translation.en: So every time something terrible happens in my life, I'm to think up something I'm glad for.
translation.ko: 끔찍한 일이 생길 때마다 좋은 일을 떠올리는 거지

translation.en: For example, the fact that both my sisters are madly in love and about to be married?
translation.ko: 내 동생들이 사랑하는 사람과 결혼하는 것도 좋은 일이지?

translation.en: No, that does nothing for me.
Well, I'm delighted for them both.
And I will come and visit later.
-Where are you going? -[Anne] Um…
I have plans.
What plans?
Upstairs? You don't even have any friends and all your relations are in this house.
translation.ko: 방에서? 친구도 없고 아는 사람은 다 이 집에 있는데 약속은 뭔 약속?

translation.en: I hate to agree with my wife, Anne, but I've been given explicit instructions
translation.ko: 아내 말에 동조하긴 싫지만 앤과 꼭 함께 돌아오라는 명령을 받았어요

translation.en: not to return to the inn without you. It'll be a little Lyme reunion.
translation.ko: 앤과 꼭 함께 돌아오라는 명령을 받았어요 라임 모임의 재회랄까요?

translation.en: Captain Harville was quite charmed by you and delighted for the prospect
translation.ko: 앤에게 깊은 감명을 받은 하빌 대령이 재회하고 싶다며 기다리고 있거든요

translation.en: of renewing your acquaintance.
He's gone to fetch Wentworth just now.
How unfortunate you have other plans.
Anne.
I've missed you.
[Harville] We need to give Wentworth a proper send-off.
translation.ko: 웬트워스가 출발하기 전에 송별회를 거하게 치러야죠

translation.en: [Charles] Absolutely. A few drinks, a game of cards.
Although I understand Anne has other plans.
translation.ko: 앤은 약속이 있다면 어쩔 수 없지만요

translation.en: I'm no card player.
Worst I've ever seen.
That was then. Time makes many changes.
translation.ko: 그땐 그때고 시간은 많은 걸 변하게 하죠

translation.en: I'm not yet so much changed.
Wentworth, sorry to interrupt but I will not rest
until that letter is signed and delivered to Admiral Croft.
translation.ko: 크로프트 제독님께 갈 때까지 계속 괴롭힐 거야

translation.en: You've been very slippery these past few months.
translation.ko: 요 몇 달 새 아주 뺀질이가 됐더군

translation.en: Of course.
Are we finished?
I suppose so.
I'll be just a moment.
You look a bit sad, Captain Harville.
Well, actually, I should be happy.
Captain Benwick has found love at last.
That's wonderful. I should think you would be pleased.
You were so determined to see him out of his misery.
But I hadn't anticipated the effect it would have on me.
translation.ko: 제게 미칠 영향을 미처 생각 못 했던 거죠

translation.en: It's as if his suffering was keeping my sister alive somehow.
translation.ko: 저는 벤윅의 고통을 통해 동생의 존재를 느꼈었나 봐요

translation.en: Poor Fanny. She would never have forgotten him so soon.
translation.ko: 가여운 패니, 그 아이였다면 빨리 잊지 않았을 텐데

translation.en: Well, that's certain.
We women do not forget you so soon as you forget us.
translation.ko: 여자들은 남자들과 달리 연인을 쉽게 잊지 못해요

translation.en: Women love beyond all sensible limits.
We cannot help ourselves.
I don't mean to venture any claims about the differences between men and women.
translation.ko: 잠시만요, 남녀 차이에 대해 토론할 생각은 없었습니다만

translation.en: [Anne] Oh, well, I will.
The only privilege I claim for my sex is that of loving longest.
translation.ko: 여자가 가진 유일한 특권이 바로 한없는 사랑이에요

translation.en: Loving even when hope is gone.
translation.ko: 모든 희망이 사라졌을 때도 사랑을 놓지 않죠

translation.en: Loving because you don't have a choice.
-[Frederick] I'm finished. -[Harville] Thank you.
There is no quarreling with you.
I think Fanny would be happy to see her Benwick cared for.
translation.ko: 짝을 찾은 대령님을 보면 패니는 기뻐할 것 같아요

translation.en: [Harville] Fanny was never the jealous type.
In moments I've wondered if it wasn't my sister's spirit in the wind
translation.ko: 사실 저도 패니의 영혼이 바람처럼 불어와

translation.en: that caused Louisa to slip,
knowing somehow eventually where she would land.
translation.ko: 그 애는 루이자가 누구랑 맺어질지 알았던 거죠

translation.en: Louisa?
I've told you,
the universe has perfect timing.
And when you had the presence of mind to tell Benwick to fetch a surgeon,
translation.ko: 앤이 벤윅을 시켜 의사를 불러오라고 했을 때

translation.en: you must have had no idea the wheels that you were setting in motion.
translation.ko: 이런 일로 이어지리라고는 상상도 못 하셨을걸요?

translation.en: Captain, I'm afraid I'm lost.
I'm speaking of Louisa's engagement to Captain Benwick, of course.
A love grown slow and sure
from his constant attention to her during her convalescence.
translation.ko: 벤윅의 극진한 보살핌 속에서 사랑이 서서히 싹튼 거죠

translation.en: Of what did you think I was speaking?
I don't know.
[Harville] I'll make sure this letter gets to Admiral Croft.
"Dear Anne…"
"…I can listen no longer in silence."
"Anne, you pierce my soul."
"Dare not say that man forgets sooner than woman,
that his love has an earlier death."
translation.ko: '남자의 사랑이 더 일찍 수명을 다한다고 말하지 마요'

translation.en: "I am half agony, half hope."
"I know you are to marry Mr. Elliot, but I will never forgive myself if I do not tell you this."
translation.ko: '엘리엇 씨와 혼인하겠지만 이 말은 꼭 전하고 싶네요'

translation.en: "You alone have brought me to Bath." [gasps]
"For you alone I think and plan."
"But of course you have not seen this. How could you?"
"Because your love has not lasted as long as mine."
"Anne…
I have loved no one but you."
"And I don't think I ever will."
Anne.
-I can explain-- -I wish you both every happiness. [laughs]
translation.ko: - 방금 본 건… - 둘이 행복하길 바랄게요

translation.en: [Frederick] "I have thought many times about how to tell you,
but the pain of a love unrequited rendered me silent."
translation.ko: '짝사랑의 고통으로 인해 입을 열 수 없더군요'

translation.en: "Tell me not that I am too late."
Frederick!
[Frederick] "My love for you has never faltered."
[Anne] There are many kinds of love.
For some, the right partnership can be a lucrative endeavor.
translation.ko: 누군가는 부를 쥐기 위해 사랑을 하고

translation.en: For others, true connection is reward enough.
[whispers] Where are they?
[Anne] It's okay to find love on your terms…
translation.ko: 누구나 나만의 사랑을 찾을 자격이 있다 "유럽 여행 우아하고 은밀하게"

translation.en: however unorthodox.
Don't let anyone tell you how to live.
translation.ko: 그 누구도 나를 대신해 내 인생에 훈수하거나

translation.en: Or who to love.
I learned the hard way.
Tilt the sextant until the image of the sun kisses the horizon.
translation.ko: 태양이 수평선에 닿을 때까지 육분의를 기울여요

translation.en: [Anne] Right, lined up.
That angle is called your sight. We would normally take a note of that.
translation.ko: 이때의 각도가 시각인데 그 숫자를 적어놓고

translation.en: Using various mathematical equations and accounting for the height of the cliff,
translation.ko: 이 절벽의 높이를 대입해 공식을 적용하면

translation.en: we can estimate our latitude.
That's all?
Well, I won't tell anyone how painfully easy nautical navigation is.
translation.ko: 항해술이 식은 죽 먹기라는 건 사람들한테 비밀로 할게요

translation.en: It might tarnish the Navy's reputation.
Well, on behalf of the Crown, we thank you for your discretion.
translation.ko: 그렇다면 왕실을 대표하여 감사 말씀을 전합니다

translation.en: I was thinking, perhaps we can enjoy a quick anchoring in Venice
before Constantinople?
Do you know what it takes to turn a ship around?
translation.ko: 배를 돌리려면 어떻게 해야 하는지 알아요?

translation.en: Yes.
From personal experience.
♪ Just the same as before ♪
